name: Ext_R5_MedicationStatement_effective
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationStatement.effective[x] for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationStatement.effective[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationStatement|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: The date/time or interval when the medication is/was/will be taken
element.definition: The interval of time during which it is being asserted that the patient is/was/will be taking the medication (or was not taking, when the MedicationStatement.adherence element is Not Taking).
element.comment: `MedicationStatement.effective[x]` maps to R4 `MedicationStatement.effective[x]`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
